products.title: Valencia Orchid Pink Roller Blind
products.description: If hot pink is too bright and baby pink too delicate, this valencia orchid pink roller blind is the perfect solution for you. The fabric is positively blushing, helping you to add a gentle and relaxing flash of colour to your home whilst filling your room with a feminine charm.

products.title: Rimini, Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: The pretty vintage of the rimini rose provides a strikingly elegant look, its dusky pink hue giving any room a warm, rosy glow. The long-lasting, resilient fabric has a smooth, effortless finish, allowing light to gently penetrate through. This blind is perfect for country chic designed rooms where it will be surrounded by cute florals and rich creams. Lovely in a bloom-filled bedroom, a light and airy hallway, or a rustic kitchen, this colour will go well with pale neutrals and country greens.

products.title: Stockholm Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.description: This stunning rosewood pink stockholm roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

products.title: Stockholm Lipstick Pink Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholm fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft rosewood pink roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Stirlo Hot Pink
products.description: Stirlohot pink plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

This primrose colouring will brighten up any room. Consider the rimini in primrose as an addition to a white or pastel coloured landing or hallway, to add a splash of colour without the need to totally redecorate.

products.title: Roma, Rose Tint - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma rose tint is as dusky as it is pretty, and its smoky overtones give this pink blind an extra level of style. Give a delicate look to a traditional dining room, pairing the tuscan rose with dark, polished woods and palest pink walls. This look would also work well in a guest or master bedroom, or even in the living room for a relaxing atmosphere.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The stripy pink is a fun way to inject some funky colour and style into any room. Or perhaps add a sense of flair to the kitchen whilst you prepare some of your favourite dishes.
